name: knuckleheadbabylon
text: Kochalka and Achewood together is one radical fantasy.

name: resident
text: A momentary diversion on the sleigh ride to heck.

name: retardo
text: For anyone who doesn't know, the guest artist here - james kochalka - posts his daily diary strips at [url]www.americanelf.com.[/url]  His most recent one is free, but the rest are available in print or in his pay archive.  It's very different from Achewood, but fantastic stuff.

name: overmedicated
text: See, why can't you be that helpful normally?

name: ghede
text:
Try this.
If that doesn't work, I'm going to look like such an ass.

name: troy_convers
text:
"I do not know you.
But you , I know you, I never forget a face, Mr...CHECKOV.

name: syrupykeyboard
text: http://www.achewood.com/index.php?date=05172004

name: intergalactic_
text: KHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAANNNNNNNNNN

name: stuart
text: Ray? I'm not going to argue with you, Ray!

name: connellingus
text: Someone animated this one a while back.

name: heccibiggs
text: UM THIS IS MY NEW FAVOURITE THING

name: charchar
text: This is my brain on that cartoon: EEEEP! Happy sushine friendship time! Life is good.

name: zapatos
text: The dude's name or the linked video?

name: tekende
text: Oh awesome that is so radical even though I don't even like this strip!

name: zapatos
text: Thank you sir.

name: berami
text: That is pretty freaking adorable.

name: mashisoyo
text: That was so cool! So cool! I really think that that was cool.

name: greenkoolayd
text: so what are you saying?

name: mashisoyo
text: ...I forget.

name: tombsgrave
text: For whatever reason I keep remembering Ray as yelling "Hug the shit out of 'em, Phillipe!"  I dunno, it just rolls off the brain better.

name: rowboat
text: Perhaps it's because that's something that actually can be done to someone, whereas hugging the fuck out of someone is sort of metaphysical.

name: presterjohn
text: Unless the target of the hug has a very specific fetish.

name: comrade_tom
text: It's more of a sex concept

name: cpnglxynchos
text: a concept .

name: tandembandit
text: Have you heard of Hug Style ?

name: c_dizzle
text: This strip deserves a Nobel peace prize.

name: thrasher
text: Crazy!

name: drskradley
text:
The love child of two great artists. Could have been horribly deformed, or the harbinger of a superior race. I propose it was the latter.

And that's the first and last time I will ever propose any superior race.

name: autrepoupee
text: I'm really not trying to be snarky but is there like, an aspect of this guy's comics i'm just not getting ? they seem pleasant and i appreciate the style, but are they supposed to be funny or just sort of a 'slice of life' kind of a thing?

name: autrepoupee
text: i dont mean achewood, I mean this kochalka fellow and his comics on the above mentioned site.

name: alzuna
text: I think they are more 'slice of life' type of things, I've never really found any of them 'haha hilarious I want a shirt of that funny' but they are interesting, like reading a stranger's blog, I think.

name: zapatos
text:
I hell of want some AmericanElf shirts, he has some totally awesome ones.

Standing in the rain smoking a cigartte. Sharing.

name: utv
text: I think the aspect you may be missing is that they are AWESOME.

name: tekende
text: A comment left by tekende was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ppccd, GMM, tripleG, theplaidknight)

name: gmm
text: You must not have a soul, tekende.

name: woodenteeth
text: Why?

name: tekende
text: I dunno. I just don't like it. It slightly annoys me.

name: woodenteeth
text: I would hazard a guess it's the contamination of the word "Fuck" used in conjunction with what Phillippe would do or does. I understand it might be something that Ray would say, but at the same time, probably not. Doesn't feel in keeping with the characters, the feel of the art in the strip. Almost a bit of a cop-out as far as final panels go. That's the feeling I get anyway.

name: delicatemoth
text: I'm not keen. It's a rude interruption to a terrific story arc. I don't think this guest adds anything to Achewood.

name: faedrus
text:
It never bothered me, because Ray is pretty much just talking to himself - Phillipe is long gone, and Téodor probably can't hear him either.

It's like wishing your friend godspeed after they have already driven off, while you finish your cigarette under the porch light.

name: plummet
text:
the worst comment

posted on the ugliest computer

name: tagrineth
text: WHY... is this not rated any higher... ;;

name: mikeronomicon
text: Operation: Iraqui huggery. Now that's how wars should be fought.

name: mikeronomicon
text: That sounds too much like Iraqui Buggery now that I think about it. This is yet another reason why I will never get to work for the Pentagon. Aside from the fact that they are twats. You know the ubiquitous they I speak of. Oh yes, you do.

name: gigs
text:
Obligatory 'my first Achewood' comment. Still one of my favorites.

Oh crap, I'm gonna get shunned because my first Achewood wasn't technically a real Achewood strip, aren't I?

name: origotoshi
text: 2 years later, and no reply. Yes, I daresay you are.

name: plummet
text:
this is the best guest strip by the way

almost the best achewood

name: fattypneumonia
text:
First of all, Kochalka is RAD.
HE. IS. RAD.

Secondly:

T: "Open the bomb bay doors, Ray"
R: "I'm sorry, Teodor, I'm afraid I can't do that"
